overview: Director James Deen continues his Seven Sins series with PRIDE, an intense thriller about a vain psychopath (played by Deen) whose harem of brainwashed women (Dana Vespoli, Phoenix Marie, Daran DeArmond) perform his sexual bidding. This tale follows an innocent, young girl (Casey Calvert) as she bears witness to a world of depravity, madness and PRIDE.
title: James Deen's 7 Sins: Pride
